sentences.en: A new round of wage increases could trigger an inflationary spiral (= a continuing rise in both wages and prices ).
sentences.cn: 新一轮的加薪会引发工资与物价的交互上涨。

sentences.en: Although the CPI growth rate has been declining, inflationary pressure still high.
sentences.cn: 尽管CPI指数有所下降, 通货膨胀的压力仍然不小.

sentences.en: In highly inflationary economies, banks must pay high interest rates to attract saving.
sentences.cn: 在严重通货膨胀的经济状况下, 银行必须提高利率,以吸引存款.

sentences.en: Index - linked pay rises insulated them against inflationary price increases.
sentences.cn: 与生活指数挂钩的工资增长使他们免受通货膨胀带来的损失.

sentences.en: Inflationary economy is one of the gut issues of today.
sentences.cn: 膨胀的经济形态是今天最重要的问题之一.

sentences.en: Inflationary pressures continued to slacken last month.
sentences.cn: 上个月，通货膨胀的压力继续减小。
经济上的通货膨胀压力

sentences.en: She argued against the increased tax imposed on companies, because it would be inflationary.
sentences.cn: 她反对增加对公司征税, 因为这种作法意味着通货膨胀.

sentences.en: Such expectations often become self - fulfilling when inflationary pressures are high.
sentences.cn: 在通胀压力居高不下时,这种期望往往自行实现.

sentences.en: The " vigilantes " in the market are supposedly alert to any inflationary threat.
sentences.cn: 按理,市场中的 “ 积极分子 ” 会提防任何通胀威胁.

sentences.en: The bank is worried about mounting inflationary pressures.
sentences.cn: 银行对日趋加大的通货膨胀压力感到担忧。

sentences.en: The danger of inflation stalked the home front because of this " inflationary gap ".
sentences.cn: 由于存在这种差距,国内就笼罩着通货膨胀的危险.

sentences.en: the inflationary effects of price rises
sentences.cn: 物价上涨引起的通货膨胀

sentences.en: The major inflationary impetus was provided by the conjunction of two factors.
sentences.cn: 重要的通货膨胀推动力是由这两个因素一起产生的.

sentences.en: They are caught in an inflationary ~ of rising prices and wages.
sentences.cn: 他们陷入物价和工资竞涨的通货膨胀恶性循环之中了.

sentences.en: They were worried about oil and food prices and inflationary pressures.
sentences.cn: 他们担忧的是石油与食物价格以及通胀压力.

sentences.en: We are in danger of getting into an inflationary spiral.
sentences.cn: 我们正陷于螺旋式通胀的危险之中.
